mapper.insert: INSERT INTO investorRefunditem (investorid,periods,promiseInterest,applyDate,principal,itemcommonid) VALUES (#{investorid}, (SELECT iterepaycount FROM itemcommon WHERE itemcommonid=#{itemcommonid}), (SELECT iteYearRate FROM itemcommon WHERE itemcommonid=#{itemcommonid}), NOW(), (SELECT money FROM fund WHERE itemcommonid=#{itemcommonid} AND userid=#{investorid}), #{itemcommonid});
